container_buttons.name: §b§lDiamond Sword
container_buttons.script:
if player.level >= 10 then
    player.giveItem('minecraft:diamond_sword', 1)
    player.sendMessage('§a§lPURCHASED! §7You got a Diamond Sword!')
    player.closeGui()
else
    player.sendMessage('§c§lERROR! §7You need §e10 levels§7 to purchase this!')
end

container_buttons.name: §6§lGolden Apple
container_buttons.script:
if player.level >= 5 then
    player.giveItem('minecraft:golden_apple', 3)
    player.sendMessage('§a§lPURCHASED! §7You got §e3x Golden Apples§7!')
else
    player.sendMessage('§c§lERROR! §7You need §e5 levels§7!')
end

container_buttons.name: §d§lMystery Book
container_buttons.script:
if player.level >= 15 then
    local roll = math.random(1, 3)
    if roll == 1 then
        player.sendMessage('§6§lLEGENDARY! §7You got something amazing!')
    elseif roll == 2 then
        player.sendMessage('§b§lRARE! §7Nice find!')
    else
        player.sendMessage('§a§lCOMMON! §7Better luck next time!')
    end
    player.giveItem('minecraft:enchanted_book', 1)
else
    player.sendMessage('§c§lERROR! §7You need §e15 levels§7!')
end

container_buttons.name: §5§lHealth Check
container_buttons.script:
local healthPercent = (player.health / player.maxHealth) * 100

if healthPercent >= 80 then
    player.sendMessage('§a§lHEALTHY! §7' .. math.floor(healthPercent) .. '% HP')
elseif healthPercent >= 50 then
    player.sendMessage('§e§lCAUTION! §7' .. math.floor(healthPercent) .. '% HP')
else
    player.sendMessage('§c§lDANGER! §7' .. math.floor(healthPercent) .. '% HP - Heal up!')
end
